Reviews.Content: berlin period 17 20 april stayed time hotel grand city hotel berlin kudamm close excellent shopping kurfürstendamm advisable bus 109 airport tegel stop approx 300 meters hotel

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights hotel flash job designed bad holiday spend lot time girl checkin desk extremely pleasant helpful breakfast fairly straightforward cold meats toast fruit juice cereals scrambled eggs boiled eggs sausage meat medallions etc negative stay german guests obnoxious sit fire en masse theyd surround start religion islamic etc strange

Reviews.Content: locations short walk shops supermarket close coffee shops rom tin compact clean price nice airport 45 min train staied winter value money

Reviews.Title: “A Gem of a Hotel”
Reviews.Author: westbury
Reviews.Content: stayed nights december hotel cant beaten location value public welcoming attractive spotlessly clean staff polite especially thomas confirm flights helpful directions singles clean quiet nicely furnished shower lots hot water towels changed day decided pay extra breakfast diappointed choice cold meats cheeses breads cereal fruit yogurt hot savoury option hotel main kudamm shopping street short walk underground station near tourist bus pick public bus stop lots busy restaurants near gorgeous corner kudamm owned charming lady cant remember name checked table cloths italian food hotel stay thoroughly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Not three stars”
Reviews.Author: snn1964
Reviews.Content: advantages hotel location hearty breakfast friendly service luncheon soft bed thats deficiencies importantly months time booking able provide minimal request smoking arrival pay extra 20 euros booked price range available comfort incidentally found horrified standard comfort rusty plumbing retro hair dryers completely wardrobe demonstrated photo

Reviews.Content: location horrible hotel hotel clean prices change night breakfast doesnt worth costs found expired milk bread mold payed eur 105 person night normally costs eur 50 berlin price plenty hotels

Reviews.Content: spent nights hotel disappointed six staying 4 booked family told check booked double chat change hard wardrobe drawers store clothes bathroom ok don’t floor vacuumed stay smelled smoke reception restaurantbar nice paid extra breakfast choice food drink hotel car park basement night spaces tight watch bumpers location bahn bahn station 5 mins walk stop tour buses 10 mins walk hotel

Reviews.Title: “Cosmetic enhancements fail to mask real problems”
Reviews.Author: SJonazzle
Reviews.Content: doubt hotel looks pleasant modern funky interior arrival pleasant reception staff welcome essentially accommodation lick paint save woodchip particular favourite desperate modernisation particular bathroom superior save shower perfunctory affair mercifully water hot central heating air conditioning superior walls woken frequently neighbouring people simply walking past communal corridor service bar slow breakfast pricey cant fault location zoo
